questions.text: Please provide us with the main business lines of your company with brief details.
Does your institution maintain a physical presence in the country? Yes/No
Please indicate the name and country in which your ultimate parent has its headquarters:
Is this questionnaire applicable to your branches and/or subsidiaries? Yes/No
Are you regulated by a supervisory authority? Yes/No
Please provide the name of your supervisory authority:
Please provide the registration or license number:
Listed company, its subsidiary or controlled company
Details of the shareholder structure
Details of beneficial owner(s) - individual(s)
Have there been any significant changes in the ownership structure over the last year? Yes/No
Please provide the names of the institution's Board of Directors and Management Board (in the case of a listed company):
Is the institution a U.S. Person or SEC Foreign Registered Broker (in the sense of the U.S. Exchange Act)? Yes/No
Do you have a compliance officer responsible for AML? Yes/No
Please provide the name and contact details of the compliance officer:
Is your country a member of the Financial Action Task Force (FATF)? Yes/No
Do you have a legal and regulatory compliance program that includes a designated officer? Yes/No
Is the financial crime compliance program approved by your institutionâ€™s board or a senior management member? Yes/No
Please provide the date of the last review of the financial crime compliance program:
Do you have a risk-based approach to monitoring and managing financial crime risks? Yes/No
Do you have a policy on the prohibition of relationships with shell banks? Yes/No
Do you have a customer identification program (CIP) in place? Yes/No
Do you have a customer due diligence (CDD) program in place? Yes/No
Do you have an enhanced due diligence (EDD) program for high-risk customers? Yes/No
Do you have a process to identify and verify beneficial ownership information? Yes/No
Do you have a program to identify and report suspicious transactions? Yes/No
Is there a process to periodically update customer information? Yes/No
Do you have a record retention policy? Yes/No
Do you have an employee training program in place for AML regulations? Yes/No
Please provide the frequency of the training program (e.g., annually):
Do you have an independent audit function to test your AML program? Yes/No
Please provide the date of the last independent audit:
Do you have policies and procedures in place to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing? Yes/No
Do you have policies and procedures in place to comply with the applicable economic sanctions? Yes/No
Do you have a policy regarding politically exposed persons (PEPs)? Yes/No
Do you screen customers against relevant watch lists? Yes/No
Do you have a policy and procedures in place to monitor and manage correspondent banking relationships? Yes/No
Do you have a policy and procedures in place to identify and manage high-risk customers and transactions? Yes/No
Do you have a policy and procedures in place to comply with tax and regulatory reporting requirements? Yes/No
